title: Week 5 Preview: Lamar vs. Burrow, Falcons-Bucs, Seahawks-Saints, and More | The Ringer NFL Preview Show
description:
Danny, Ben, and Steven preview the Week 5 slate, starting with Ravens-Bengals, then discuss how Lamar could find success against the Bengals defense (2:01). Then they predict the Monday morning headlines for Cowboys-Rams, Falcons-Bucs, Seahawks-Saints, and Chargers-Browns (21:05).

Hosts: Danny Heifetz, Ben Solak, and Steven Ruiz
Associate Producer: Isaiah Blakely
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
